User-agent: *
Allow: /

# Sitemap
Sitemap: https://themeetpatel.com/sitemap.xml

# Crawl-delay
Crawl-delay: 1

# Disallow admin areas (if any)
Disallow: /admin/
Disallow: /private/
Disallow: /_next/
Disallow: /api/

# Allow important pages
Allow: /about
Allow: /portfolio
Allow: /blog
Allow: /contact
Allow: /systems

# Host
Host: https://themeetpatel.com
